Application.Management

Class AdminManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Management.AdminManagementController

  • @Controller
public class AdminManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing Administrator accounts.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getLogin

        @RequestMapping(value="/create-admin",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getLogin(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Loads the page for managing Administrator account. Prepares the creation of a new admin account by creating an instance of the Credentials class and adding it to the Model.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        Returns:
        "admin-management" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • createAdminProfile

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/createAdminProfile",
                method=POST)
private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> createAdminProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="createNewPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String newPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="createConfirmNewPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String confirmNewPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="createUsernameTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                            @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String cookie,
                                                                                                                                                            @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String lang)
        Implements the creation of a Administrator account.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        newPasswordTextForm - String with the password to use for the Administrator account.
        confirmNewPasswordTextForm - String with the password to use for the Administrator account. This is mainly to double-check on the server-side that the passwords match.
        username - String with the username to use for the Administrator account.
        cookie - String, cookie of the creator of the Administrator account.
        lang - String, code for the language to use.
        Returns:
        array of two elements {String, String}. The first element is the status of the operation, the second element is the name of the Thymeleaf template. Possible returned pages are:
        • "scenario-panel"
        • "error"

      • createAdminId

        private java.lang.String createAdminId()
        Private helper method used to create a new Administrator identifier.
        Returns:
        newId the new Administrator identifier.

      • adminLogout

        @RequestMapping(value="/admin-logout",
                method=POST)
private java.lang.String adminLogout(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                         @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                         java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Performs the logout action by invalidating the cookie for an Administrator.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the creator of the new Scenario to perform the logout for.
        response - see HttpServletResponse.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
